title: Video card and Video Drivers up to date and still having issues with them
body: I tried to enter a game and got  a msg saying that i have my video card and my video drivers obsolete yet the ent didn't know what was the exact error this happened again in a custom game after i checked them and updated them and still got the same message

replies.body: It helps if you say what GPU and driver version you are using, also laptop?
